name: Cyber-Space Ranger
description:
In this game, you will be a Space Ranger. Your mission is to kill robots (and a Boss Robot) from another planet.
Throw your mission you will collect some money, bonuses, keys, etc.

My modifications:

  • Updated skins, pickups, locations.
  • Updated animations.
  • New pickup - Extra Jump.
  • New enemy - Boss.
  • Hidden rooms.
